years as a radio talk-show host, Mike Pence started a TV show in 1995. Although Mike Pence was inspired by conservative talk-show host Rush Limbaugh , he kept to his ''no personal attacks'' pledge. Conservative media, including Rush Limbaugh , have a tremendous blind spot when it comes to making a distinction between differences in public policy and personal differences, Mike Pence told The Indianapolis Star in 1995. When McIntosh, who succeeded Sharp, decided to run for governor in 2000, Mike Pence won a six-way primary for the GOP nomination in the east-central Indiana district.

17 percent, to$ 8.44 billion, from$ 6.67 billion a year earlier. Net revenue, which excludes commissions paid to advertising partners, was$ 6.37 billion, up from$ 4.95 billion. Our strong performance has been driven by a rapidly growing digital economy, continuous product innovation that benefits both users and advertisers, and by the extraordinary momentum of our newer businesses, such as display and mobile, Mr. Eric Schmidt said in a statement. ''It's not a journal, it's not a diary,'' he says of the Gerald Ford White House notes. It is a set of working documents that I've never edited. In fact, most I've never reread. '' It wasn't about putting lipstick on a pig, said Jackson. ''It was to transform the pig into a handsome prince. And they did it!'' The transformation, he said, took an attention to detail on the engineering side that you can't fake. I have nothing but admiration for Sergio Marchionne for unleashing it, and for his team for executing it. Indeed, nobody, except maybe Sergio Marchionne himself, believed Chrysler could redo its product line so dramatically in 18 months.
